DOC.brief_summary: Dietary protein is the more satiating nutrient, however it is not clear whether satiety may be influenced by the nature of the protein. This study was designed to assess potential differences between protein sources on satiety and their relationship with digestive and metabolic kinetics.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Protein Source on Satiety and Metabolism
DOC.criteria: BMI between 25 and 30 allergy to milk proteins
